## CountryType.iso property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Two letter ISO 3166 country code of the country. See [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List\_of\_ISO\_3166\_country\_codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_3166_country_codes) for more information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
iso: string;
```
